details.title: Error Analysis of Space-Stable Inertial Navigation Systems
details.abstract: The error equations for a space-stable inertial navigation system are derived. This is done by directly perturbing the mechanization equations in the inertial frame and then transforming in open-loop fashion to the local-level frame. A rotating inertial platform and velocity and altitude damping are considered. The relations between errors in space-stable and local-level systems are noted. Numerical results are presented for certain random error sources.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
